text: Traci Elizabeth Lords (born Nora Louise Kuzma; May 7, 1968) is an American writer, director, musician and actress. Most of her movies are B-movies. She played "Carl's Date" in the movie Serial Mom. She also played Racquel in Blade. Lords first became known for being in pornographic movies before she was an adult. Lords was born in Steubenville, Ohio. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * 1000 Fires (1995) ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American pornographic actors Category:Actors from Ohio Category:1968 births Category:People from Steubenville, Ohio Category:Living people
title: Traci Lords
